mermaid:
C4Container
title Calorie Tracker App - Windows PC Architecture

Person(User, "Health Conscious User", "Wants to track daily food intake and manage nutrition goals")

System_Boundary(windowsApp, "Windows Calorie Tracker Application") {
    Container(uiLayer, "Desktop UI Layer", "WPF / WinUI 3 / .NET MAUI", "Main window, food search interface, daily log view, progress charts, user settings")
    
    Container(businessLogic, "Business Logic Layer", "C# .NET", "Calorie calculations, macro tracking, goal management, data validation, report generation")
    
    Container(localCache, "Local Data Cache", "SQLite", "Offline food database, user history, daily logs, cached API responses")
    
    Container(syncEngine, "Sync Engine", "C# .NET", "Background synchronization, conflict resolution, offline queue management")
}

System_Ext(nutritionApi, "Nutrition Database API", "USDA FoodData Central / Edamam / Nutritionix", "Comprehensive food nutrition data, barcode lookup")
System_Ext(cloudStorage, "Cloud Backup Service", "Azure Blob / AWS S3 / OneDrive API", "User data backup, cross-device synchronization")
System_Ext(authService, "Authentication Service", "Azure AD / Auth0 / Firebase Auth", "User authentication, secure token management")

Rel(User, uiLayer, "Enters food items, views stats, sets goals")
Rel(uiLayer, businessLogic, "Routes user actions and data")
Rel(businessLogic, localCache, "Reads/Writes user data and food history")
Rel(businessLogic, syncEngine, "Triggers sync operations")
Rel(syncEngine, cloudStorage, "Backs up encrypted user data", "HTTPS/SSL")
Rel(syncEngine, authService, "Authenticates sync requests", "OAuth 2.0")
Rel(businessLogic, nutritionApi, "Searches food database, gets nutrition info", "REST API / JSON")
Rel(localCache, nutritionApi, "Caches frequently accessed items")

UpdateLayoutConfig($c4ShapeInRow="3", $c4BoundaryInRow="1")
